message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. It comes with a unique set of features designed to enhance your experience and provide unparalleled value. Given its quality and the effort put into it, I believe this product is worth more than just a glance. I kindly propose a price of $200 for it. I understand that everyone has different budgets and needs, so if $200 is beyond your current budget, please let me know your maximum acceptable price, and we can try to find a mutually agreeable solution. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your response.
